meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Erik Dresner Michelle Princi Sara Lehmann Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6448.

td.p: Erik Dresner, an Internet marketer from Elmhurst, New York
Michelle Princi, a government analyst from Silver Spring, Maryland
Sara Lehmann, a retail sales associate from Albuquerque, New Mexico (whose 1-day cash winnings total $24,800)

tr.td: WOOD
LITERARY SEQUELS
THE 19TH CENTURY
TOON TOWN
STARTS WITH "GH"
MONTH, PLEASE
(Alex: Hey, there are only 12 of them.)
